speech.0: This evening, the delegation of Belgium made baseless allegations against Iranian nuclear programme by considering it as a threat to the international non-proliferation regime. In this regard and in exercise of right of reply, I should like to state the following. First, these allegations are without any foundation. Irans nuclear activities are and always have been for peaceful purposes, and the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) has repeatedly confirmed the peaceful nature of Irans nuclear programme. the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons (NPT), the development of peaceful nuclear energy is an inalienable right of every Member State, and my country is no exception in this regard.
